feed.title: May all be serene and well with you.

entry.title: Welcome to Zhixu's Homepage!
entry.content:
Hello and welcome! My name is Zhixu Li, and I'm thrilled to have you here on my personal homepage.

A little about me—I am currently a Ph.D. student of Professor Zhang Qian. You can find my resume here. My LinkedIn page is here.

You can contact me through the following methods：

MailZli538@ucr.edu

Mailcalt2008lzx@gmail.com

QQ 1011412062

# My Experience

# Here are my experiences in:

News

Selected to serve in ASPLOS’24 Artifact Evaluation Committee. -----July.2023

Started my new journey as a Ph.D. student at UCR. -----Sep.2023

Selected to serve in 24th ChinaSys Workshop (ChinaSys 2023 Posters) Program Committee.-----June.2023

Education Experience

University of California Riverside Riverside, CA, US

PhD student -----Sep. 2023-Current

Harbin Institute of Technology at Weihai Weihai, China

B.Eng. in Cyberspace Security (School of Computer Science & Technology) -----Sep. 2019-Jun. 2023

University of California Riverside Extension Riverside, CA
Graduate Preparation Program in Engineering (GPP-E) -----Sep. 2022-June.2023

Working Experience

UCR,CSE

Reader(TA) for CS142 -----Jan,2023~ April,2023

UCR,CSE

Reader(TA) for CS260 -----April ,2023~June,2023

# Guidance interface

You can find my other blogs ,where I write about my insights in study or experiences in life:

  • Presentation
  • Daily Writing

I also have a portfolio showcasing some of the projects I've worked on, and I'm excited to share them with you. My hope is that you'll find the content here informative, engaging, and maybe even inspiring.

I'm glad for your visit. Feel free to explore the site, leave comments, and get in touch—I'd love to hear from you.

Thank you for visiting, and enjoy your stay!

Best,

Zhixu Li

entry.content:
# Who may want to Read this page

I’m a freshman in Academic Research and I want to

  • Take the first step in my academic career and want to understand the basic common sense and unspoken rules of academia

# Guidance interface

You can find my other blogs ,where I write about my insights and experiences in life and study, in the following list:

  • Presentation
  • Daily Writing
  • Leetcode/Codeforce

I also have a portfolio showcasing some of the projects I've worked on, and I'm excited to share them with you. My hope is that you'll find the content here informative, engaging, and maybe even inspiring.

Whether you're a fellow [profession or interest, e.g., programmer, traveler, book lover, etc.] or just curious to learn more, I'm glad you stopped by. Feel free to explore the site, leave comments, and get in touch—I'd love to hear from you.

Thank you for visiting, and enjoy your stay!

Best,

Zhixu Li
